basics.name: Chih-Chuan, Hsu
basics.label: Graduate Researcher
basics.summary: An immersed programmer holding a basketball lost in the forest.

work.name: OME Technology
work.summary: Designing a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) to implement anomaly detection in PCR machine. With dropout and test-time augmentation (TTA), I attained 98% accuracy.

work.name: National Taiwan University
work.summary: Leading the experiments of forest measurement and sampling tools with 35 classmates.

work.name: National Taiwan University
work.summary: First, I utilized YOLOv7 to detect the patient's position in a monitoring system. Second, I extracted the features from patients' notes written by their families, and predict the potential of sarcopenia using LLM (Bert-Base-Chinese).

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
